title: Interpretation of seeing jasmine in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing jasmine in a dream? It symbolizes blessings in the life of the person who sees it. What is the meaning of seeing it in a dream? It indicates conflict with the surrounding people. What is the interpretation of wearing a necklace of jasmine flowers? A sign of love and respect between a woman and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing a tree in yellow? Warning From the presence of an evil woman who carries in her heart hatred and hatred for others. Interpretation of seeing white jasmine roses in a dream: This vision symbolizes the dreamer’s feeling of love and security with his life partner. The vision shows the blessings available in the dreamer’s life. Seeing angels descending from heaven not plucking the rose in a dream means that Scientists are going to the dreamer’s land. Seeing a tree indicates the birth of a male fetus. Warning: Seeing a cut rose in a dream is a sign of worry and depression that prevails in the dreamer. The vision portends a change in circumstances for the better in the coming period. The vision symbolizes goodness, livelihood, and blessing that the dreamer will receive. The vision expresses longevity. The age of the dreamer and his enjoyment of health and well-being. The smell of roses in a dream indicates the death of sadness and anxiety that the dreamer feels. Interpretation of a dream about Jasmine Ibn Sirin. Seeing jasmine in a dream means pleasure, joy, and happiness in which the dreamer will find himself. Jasmine appears in a dream to get rid of worries and relieve anxiety. Vision. Jasmine in its season on trees indicates a new baby. The name Yasmine in a dream indicates the marriage of a single person. Jasmine in a dream indicates getting rid of bad thoughts. Interpretation of a dream about Yasmine about Nablus: Whoever sees in a dream that he gave someone a bouquet of jasmine, this indicates the emergence of some Problems and disputes between them. The jasmine tree in a dream indicates a lot of wealth and goodness. Jasmine in a dream generally indicates relief from worries and freedom from problems and sorrows. Seeing angels in a dream gathering jasmine is evidence of the departure of the scholars of that country. Whoever sees in his dream that he smells the scent of jasmine This indicates the end of his worries. Interpretation of a dream about jasmine in a man’s dream: Wearing a crown of jasmine roses on the head in a dream indicates the high position that a man occupies in his work. The vision predicts that the dreamer will receive a financial reward. The vision symbolizes receiving roses from a beautiful woman in a dream, achieving goals after all. This waiting. Seeing him giving it in a dream means disagreement with the people around him. A man who takes a tan in a dream means good luck that will help him achieve goals. Seeing in an unmarried man’s dream symbolizes a beautiful and rich woman, and the dreamer is trying to get close to her. Interpretation of a dream about collecting jasmine White for a married woman: The vision heralds the happiness that fills the woman’s home, and spraying perfumes in the home expresses friendship and love between her children. The vision symbolizes the calm and psychological comfort that the girl enjoys after achieving her goals. The vision expresses the woman’s tender feelings and that is why her husband loves her. It also indicates the husband’s effort in Always making his wife happy. Wearing a jasmine rose necklace is a sign of love and respect between a woman and her husband. Smelling it symbolizes the death of anxiety, sadness, and freedom from problems. Vision

title: Interpretation of the dream of praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: Seeing prayer in a dream Imad al-Din’s prayer and seeing it in a dream are mostly promising things, and some of them come as a warning to a person to withdraw from crooked paths, and interpretation scholars rely on knowing his condition in the dream and the events mentioned in. Vision. Seeing prayer in a dreamThere are many meanings and connotations associated with seeing prayer in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is praying, this is clear evidence that God will fulfill his calling and fulfill his desires in the very near future. If one sees in his dream that he is praying, many things will happen. Of the positive developments in his life on the practical, social and economic levels, making it much better than it was before. When the dreamer sees himself performing the five daily prayers, this is clear evidence that he is honest, trustworthy, keeps his word and does not betray obligations. If one is suffering from crises And many difficulties in his life and he saw in his dream that he was praying, this is clear evidence that God will change his circumstances for the better in the near future. The vision of prayer in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many meanings and connotations related to the vision of prayer in a dream, which are as follows: If a person sees in a dream that he He prays, this is clear evidence of his high status, high position, and possession of the highest positions in society. If one sees prayer in his dream, this is a sign that he is approaching God with good deeds, moving away from all doubts, taking the right path and extending his hand to everyone around him. Interpretation of Dreams To perform the noon prayer on a day with moderate weather, there will be great positive changes in all aspects of his life that will make it better than it was before. If the dreamer is married and sees in his dream that he is performing the sunset prayer, then this is a clear indication that the upbringing of his children is fruitful, as they obey him and do not They disobey him in the matter. If a person sees in his dream that he is performing the dawn prayer, this is a sign that God will change his dreams from poverty to wealth and prosperity in the coming period. Seeing prayer in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman praying in her dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If the Virgin in her sleep admires the church prayer, this is a clear sign that she is a pure girl, close to God and reminds him by always standing, sitting, and leaning on him. If a non-relative girl sees the church prayer in her dream, this is strong evidence of the extent of the bond between her and her family and the extent of love. Mutual and affection between them. If an unmarried woman sees a prayer in her dream, God will change her situation for the better, revitalize her financial situation and bring prosperity and comfort to her life. Interpretation of a dream about praying Istikhara in a dream for a girl who has not been married before means that she will meet her life partner in the near future. If it continues An unmarried woman is studying and sees prayer in her dream, then this is clear evidence that God will grant her success in the scientific aspect. Seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman praying in a dream has many connotations and interpretations, the most important of which are the following: In the event that the dreamer gets married and

title: Interpretation of the menstrual cycle in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the fall of her menstrual cycle indicates the happy life that she will soon accept in her life. Interpretation of the appearance of the menstrual cycle in a dream for a single girl: Seeing the heavy menstrual cycle for unmarried women is an indication of the health problems that she suffered from in her life. If her menstrual cycle was at a different time, this indicates Until the date of her wedding approaches. An on-time menstrual cycle for a single girl in a dream indicates blessing and goodness for her in her life. If she is in her menstrual period, this is a sign that she has gotten rid of a difficult matter she is going through. A black menstrual cycle in a dream for an unmarried woman, which is interpreted It means deceiving those close to her about something. If she sees her menstrual cycle in one dream, this indicates that she has achieved her goals in life. A single woman who looks at her menstrual cycle is a sign that she is holding on to something in her life. Menstrual blood in a single woman’s dream indicates To the collapse of the worries and problems that she faces and sees. See also: Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream for a single woman and pregnant woman. Interpretation of observing the menstrual cycle in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the menstrual cycle for a married woman indicates her closeness to her husband and her great love for him in life. If she is trying to hide her role, this indicates To a secret in her life that she is hiding. Heavy menstrual blood in a dream is an indication of the soonest date of her pregnancy in life, God willing. It indicates that menstrual blood in a dream is an indication of achieving many of her goals and dreams. A married woman who has her menstrual cycle is an indication of the presence of a lot of nutrition. In her life. If a married woman sees that her husband is having intercourse with her during her menstrual period, this means that she and her family will travel. If a married woman thinks that she is menstruating, this indicates that she has made a mistake in her life, and God knows best. Seeing the washing of menstruation is a sign of cleansing sins in her life. Interpretation of the appearance of the menstrual cycle In a dream for a divorced woman, divorced women who see their period in a dream indicate that something sad is trying to end her life. If she sees heavy menstrual blood, this indicates the great psychological pressures she suffers from in her life. If her menstrual cycle is black, this indicates a great loss that you will face during this period. It indicates that seeing her menstruating in a dream means that she has committed some sin and disobedience. It indicates that seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream means that she will be blessed with a good man in her life. If the menstrual blood is red in color, this means that she has been saved from a health problem that she was dealing with. With her. Seeing menstruation in a dream indicates a great deal of pressure that one is exposed to from his or her work. It also indicates that seeing others’ menstrual cycle in a dream is a sign that she will be saved from poverty in her life. Interpretation of menstrual blood on women’s clothes in a dream: vision Menstrual blood on the clothes of an unmarried woman is a sign that she has committed sins and immorality in her life. Washing the clothes from menstrual blood is a sign of purity from the sins they have committed. Whether she sees menstrual blood on her clothes in public places, this is a sign that something

title: Interpretation of seeing thunder and its meaning in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of hearing thunder in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream indicates goodness and blessing that will dominate the dreamer, especially if it is accompanied by rain. Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream could be a sign of warning the dreamer that something bad will happen to him in the future. Seeing thunder in a dream is evidence of threats and threats and a warning of the emergence of war. Interpretation of seeing thunder in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman who hears the sound of thunder in a dream reflects her psychological state and suffers from fear of the people around her. And the sound of thunder in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates strength and anger. And a statement of rebellion. The sound of thunder in a dream can be a sign of frozen desires and her inability to express them. The sound of thunder in a dream is for a married woman. The sound of thunder in a married woman’s dream shows how worried she is about her future and her life. As for seeing thunder and hearing its sound while she is happy, this indicates that she is enjoying life. With a life full of happiness. There are those who interpret hearing the sound of thunder in a dream as an indication of the extent of her anxiety and fear of the future and the tension that she feels. Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream may be a sign of the disputes and quarrels that they face, whether with her husband or one of her relatives. Thunder in a dream For a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who hears the sound of thunder in a dream indicates that the time of birth is approaching and the safety of herself and her fetus. The sound of thunder in a man’s dream. A man who hears the sound of thunder in a dream indicates that he enjoys vitality and energy. Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream indicates the orders that the man receives, either From his master or from his boss. Meanings of thunder in a dream from the Qur’an. Seeing thunder in a dream, of course according to the interpretation of the Holy Qur’an, means praise and thanks to God, and it is one of the signs that spread the word to the believers. It could be a warning sign for the dreamer that he is on the path of deception and must stay away from it and follow The path to guidance. Interpretation of seeing thunder in a dream. Who do people see in a dream? Thunder waiting for rain, and this indicates the goodness and blessing that prevails in this region. There are those who interpreted seeing thunder in a dream as indicating lack of money and lack of religiosity. Seeing thunder in a dark and depressing atmosphere, this dream It does not bode well. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing thunder in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Shamloul website. cheerful

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman giving birth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a woman who gave birth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a woman who gave birth in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a woman who gave birth in a dream could be a warning sign of the problems surrounding her, and God knows best. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees childbirth it can lead to good and good changes, And God knows the unseen. It may be a sign of good news, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing work can indicate financial crises, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of hearing the news of someone’s illness in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of hearing the news of someone’s illness in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, the The dreamer’s vision of serious illness and death could be a sign of good news, and God knows the unseen. When you see an illness, it can lead to health, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees illness, it may be good and healthy, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a person in danger in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a person in distress in a dream about distress that can To express hatred for this world and love for the afterlife, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a troubled person, this may lead to getting closer to God, and God knows the unseen. When you see sadness and screaming out of fear of God, it can lead to comfort, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees sadness and crying, it may be a sign of sadness. In reality, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about praying behind a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about praying behind a man in a dream can lead to a happy marriage, God willing, as it may be an indication of a good husband, and God knows the unseen. But if a girl sees that she is praying behind a man, she may turn to a good husband, and God knows the unseen. The highest and most knowledgeable. Also, a woman’s prayer in the mosque in a dream expresses humility, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love walking with you in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone you love walking with you in a dream can lead to love, and God knows best. When you see a single girl walking with someone you love on a bright path, this It can lead to marriage, and God knows the unseen. And since if an unmarried girl is seen walking with someone she loves on a dark path, it may express to her that he is helping him walk on the wrong path, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a man whose leg was cut off in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a man whose leg was cut off in a dream. A dream could be a sign of the loss that he is experiencing, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a severed leg portends bad news, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a man with his leg cut off, it may be a loss of a job, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a man whose leg was cut off in a dream, it may indicate This is due to the corruption of religion, and God knows the unseen. When you see a gift, it may indicate happiness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a gift in a dream, it may be a sign of friendship, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a single girl sees the gift, it may lead to an approaching relationship, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone. title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a Mercedes

preview.html: And when you see it in a dream, quickly go to search sites on the Internet to search for an interpretation of dreams about driving a luxury Mercedes.Interpretation of the vision of driving a Mercedes in a dream for a single girl. Driving and driving a luxury car like a Mercedes in a dream for a single girl. The vision indicates that the dreamer will be happy in his next life. He will be full of joy and happiness and will have a lot of friction in his life. Seeing a girl in a dream driving a luxury car with someone who is not a relative. The girl’s vision shows that God Almighty will make room for her with this young man and soon he will propose to her. Her vision could be great evidence of her separation or distance from Almighty God. A single girl drives a luxury car in her dream. A single girl’s vision shows that she is a strong person with her own decisions, Without interference from anyone. A sign for her to lead her family and hers on the path to prosperity and success. At the same time, her vision shows that she will soon become a reason for her family’s joy and happiness. The indication of her vision is that she will soon enjoy positive things in her life and that care Goodness and abundance will enter her and her family soon by God’s command. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream from the Moments website. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman. It is said in a dream about a girl whose teeth are falling out in her sleep that this indicates that this girl has transcended the state of extreme confusion and despair in many matters surrounding her, and perhaps this is an indication of If she was exposed to a severe shock as a result of betrayal or deception, and for a girl who watches during her sleep that her front teeth are falling out, this is a sign that she will lose a friend or someone dear to her, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a married woman. As for the significance of teeth falling out in a dream For a married woman, it has many connotations, as commentators mentioned: If a woman is married and has children, and she sees in her dream that her teeth are falling out, this indicates that she is... He takes care of her children, is afraid of them, and is extremely afraid. It states that this woman will give birth soon, and that teeth falling out in a married woman’s dream could indicate an upcoming financial crisis, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a pregnant womanScientists have reported that a pregnant woman sees her teeth falling out in a dream and this has to do with her feelings and internal fear of Losing her fetus. Her husband's teeth are falling out, so this could be an indication of disagreements and problems between her and her partner. As for seeing her children’s teeth falling out in a dream, this is an indication that the children are stumbling in their studies and it is a warning to the mother of the need to monitor and care for her children. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out by hand in a dream: The meaning of seeing teeth falling out by hand in a dream, this indicates that the loss that that person suffers will be compensated for. God willing, whatever that loss may be. Rotten teeth fall out in his hand, which indicates that he possesses prohibitive money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the lower teeth falling out in a dream: As for seeing the lower teeth falling out in a dream, this is good news, as commentators mentioned that seeing the lower teeth falling out in a dream is better than seeing the upper teeth, molars, or molar teeth. is falling. Of joy, happiness, and goodness for the unmarried girl and the pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that one of his upper teeth has fallen out, this means that he will lose a loved one and a friend. It means that her engagement will be canceled or she will leave someone who loves her. This will comfort her lover, who is in pain and tired, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out with blood in a dream: As for a man who sees in his dream that his teeth are falling out with blood, this is evidence that his wife or a woman close to him will give birth and that the baby will be a boy. Complete the marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation in general that seeing teeth falling out in a dream is an indication of the number of years a person has spent in effort, and this is news of the coming and appearance of relief. Of great future changes filled with comfort, happiness and goodness.

title: Interpretation of a man’s dream: the meaning of cutting a man in a Nabulsi dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a man in a dream: If the right or left leg is cut off from the knee from the heel to the thigh, the leg is cut off for a married girl, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, and an unmarried young man, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and others. Interpretation of a man in a dream. A man’s vision in a dream is the man’s body, and the legs are his strength. In good times and bad, and if he sees that his feet ascended to the sky and moved away from him, his father will die. Whoever dreams that he committed adultery with his foot, then he walks after women. And whoever sees that he walks barefoot, he suffers from fatigue and exhaustion. Whoever dreams of eating a human being will receive a sacrifice as a way to God Almighty, his affairs will be successful, and he will be satisfied. All his needs in his religious and worldly affairs. Whoever sees that his feet are burning, he will change what he has and change Whoever sees that he has many legs, this is good and profitable for the traveler and for those who can afford to drive, and for navigators there is a journey that has many benefits, and for the poor there are things for those who wish for good. For the sick eye, he loses his sight, and for the wicked, imprisonment, grief, and accusation. And whoever sees one of his legs turned into stone, it dries up and does not benefit from it. Whoever dreams of stepping on an angel with two feet, then knocks with two feet walking on a dinar with a picture of the king. Whoever sees his leg cut off, half of his money is gold, both of them are in debt. Whoever dreams that his leg is broken, does not approach the Sultan for days and leaves his country and asks God for a good time. They said that if he gets sick, this is his death. Whoever dreams that one of his legs is longer than the other. He travels and seeks help. Whoever sees a king cutting off the leg of another king takes slaves from his men. Whoever sees that he has four legs, if he is poor, he travels and asks for help, and if he is rich, he gets sick, and it may indicate a long life and old age, and an indication of the death of the sick person. Whoever dreams that he walks on one leg, this indicates the loss of half his money or half his life. Whoever dreams that he walks on three legs, then he will not die until he walks with a stick, either because of his old age and long life, or because of his descent. Whoever sees that his legs are made of iron, this indicates longevity. His lifespan and good fortune in his livelihood and wealth, and if he sees them made of glass, this indicates his short life and weak ability. If he sees them made of silver, he will strive for them to search for women, and if he sees them made of copper, he will strive for them in a state of bankruptcy, and if he sees them made of lead, this indicates numbness or bleeding, unless it is Present in the dream. He has a good appearance, so he strives with them to please God Almighty or stands by them for the sake of God. Come here. If he sees that the flesh of his feet has gone, then this indicates his righteousness, and his toes show good deeds. And whoever sees that his feet hurt him, he will strive for evil deeds and be punished. Interpretation of the two men in a dream about Al-Ahsa. As for the two men, they are his parents, or his burden, or what the man depends on. In his livelihood, what he sees in what he sees of adornment or shame, their interpretation is for them. The escape of his money or his death, and whoever sees his legs made of iron or copper, this indicates an increase in his life and money, and whoever sees that his feet are made of clay, this indicates a short life and a decrease in his money. Whoever sees that his foot has become a thing for a person

Whoever sees that his foot has become a thing for a person

title: What is the most accurate interpretation of the dream of falling from a high position and death by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place and death: Perhaps seeing a fall from a very high place is one of the most terrifying visions for many of us, especially if that fall causes the death of a person. Therefore, we find that the majority seeks the correct interpretation of this vision as an attempt to reassure the heart of what worries them, and we find that the interpreters differed in placing the connotations of this vision between the hater who sees it and the one who sees it. He hates it, and this varies according to what the dreamer sees in his dream, and we will mention all the consequences of this vision in the next article. Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place and death. Seeing a fall in a dream is generally considered one of the visions that express the movements of life, as there is no room for stability or stability without the other. If If you saw yourself falling from a height, this indicates a change in circumstances from one situation to another, and this change could be for the better or for the worse, and this depends on the fortuneteller’s current situation and the extent of his response. To changes and his interaction with them. The fall here symbolizes not only movement in circumstances, but also symbolizes the country in which the fortuneteller resides, the social status, the ideas and beliefs in which he believes, or the wife who may replace his wife or marry another woman. As for To see him falling from a height and dying, this vision shows the fears that inhabit him and the obsessions that push him to disbelieve in every event and situation he faces. This vision also expresses seeing the future as a mysterious matter and it will never be the way the person expects, which leads to taking refuge in another world that the person imagines And he lives in it far from reality. And if he dreamed that he was escaping from death, and in the meantime he fell and died, then this vision shows the decree of God that he cannot escape from or change. This vision expresses an approaching term, falling into a serious disaster or being exposed to a serious illness that is inevitable. From him. Seeing a fall and death could be a sign of the dreamer’s mistakes and sins, making him blind and clouding his sight. The vision here is a sign of the death of his heart and the dissolution of the relationship that connects him with God, and drowning in the world of lust and following the world and the spirit. And if he sees that he is falling from a high place, and he If he falls inside his house, this indicates that his family is subjected to a harsh experience, or that he is being subjected to a test from God, or that his friend is going through it. A serious crisis, and the affliction here is either a lack of money, a deterioration in health, or the loss of lofty things before him. This vision has many meanings, including the qualities that characterize a person, such as excessive stinginess, evasion of responsibilities and duties, and cruelty to others. Interpretation of a dream Ibn Sirin refers to falling from a high position and death. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a fall in general indicates abandonment or contradiction of something dear to the dreamer. He may lose his wife, or someone close to him, or the situation he is in now, or the work he is doing, or anything else. That he belongs to him. This vision indicates what the dreamer fears and refuses to confront. If the fear is of death, then this vision indicates the necessity of accepting certainty; Not being able to change it or escape it is a no

title: Secrets of interpreting the vision of the beloved’s family in a dream by Ibn Sirin in good and evil

preview.html: Today we know the interpretation of seeing a lover’s family in a dream. A girl who dreams of this dream often thinks about the steps she has to take in her life with the person she loves and always believes that they should meet together until the end of life in the wedding apartment that crowns their love story. Successfully, but what does the vision of the beloved’s family in a dream indicate? Is it an ominous or reprehensible vision? Through the following article from the encyclopedia website, we will present to you what the experts said about the interpretation of the dream of the beloved’s family in a dream for the single, the pregnant, and the married, and various good and evil situations. Follow us. Interpretation of the vision of the beloved’s family in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The unmarried girl who sees in her dream the family of the person who She feels love. This dream symbolizes the feelings that this girl feels, as she feels love and stability towards him in this relationship. If the girl sees in her dream that the family of the person she loves, then this dream is a good dream, as it shows their agreement with their son’s marriage and his connection to her. It is a vision It is bad for an unmarried girl to see that the family of the person she loves is upset in a dream, and they feel sad or angry, and this dream means that in reality they do not approve of their son’s relationship with her, and that they do not want to consummate their marriage. Seeing the family of her beloved in an unmarried girl’s dream is considered a dream. Promising because it indicates that this girl will achieve all the dreams and goals that she seeks in her life and that these dreams will bring her happiness and pleasure. Some dream interpretation researchers say that a girl who sees her lover’s family in a dream indicates that her lover’s family feels closeness and tenderness towards the girl’s family and that The relationship between them is a good relationship without hatred and resentment. Seeing the lover’s family in a dream An unmarried girl who sees in a dream the family of the person she loves, this dream is interpreted according to different interpretations, such as: This dream symbolizes that this girl thinks a lot about her desire to marry the person she loves. She loves him and she is waiting for the moment when this connection will come. This dream can indicate that the person she loves is very attached to his family and that they have a special place in his life and that they have priority in every matter related to them and the girl should know that. Well, he has realized that his family is more important to him than her, and he knows whether he can handle that or not. One of the good symbols of seeing a lover’s family in a dream is that the parents will treat the girl well after the marriage is completed and she will not feel alienated when she is among them. Interpretation of a dream about entering The home of the beloved’s family for a single woman. There are many interpretations given by dream interpretation scholars regarding an unmarried girl seeing herself entering her lover’s house, and among these interpretations: An unmarried girl who dreams of entering her lover’s house. This dream symbolizes that marriage between her and her lover will happen soon, God willing. And that she will move to live in that house. Among the interpretations provided by scholars, this vision symbolizes the feelings of trust and security that this girl feels towards her.
